doc:
Curtis McClarin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curtis_McClarin 0 Curtis L. McClarin (December 19, 1969 – March 4, 2014) was an American film, television and stage actor. He began all three careers in the early-1990s, appearing in films such as The Hard Way and Fresh, in the television film Murder Without Motive: The Edmund Perry Story about the death of Edmund Perry, and on Broadway in the Tony Award-nominated musical Bring in 'da Noise, Bring in 'da Funk. Curtis_L._McClarin ( December_19_,_1969 – March_4_,_2014 ) was an_American_film_,_television_and_stage_actor . He began all_three_careers in the_early-1990s , appearing in films such_as The_Hard_Way and Fresh , in the_television_film_Murder Without Motive : The_Edmund_Perry_Story about the_death of Edmund_Perry , and on Broadway in the_Tony_Award-nominated_musical_Bring in ' da_Noise , Bring in ' da_Funk .
